text: Federico Luppi (; February 23, 1936, in Ramallo, Buenos Aires Province - October 20, 2017 in Buenos Aires)Murió el actor Federico Luppi a los 81 años was an Argentine-Spanish movie, television, radio and theatre actor.Federico Luppi's profile Rotten Tomatoes He is known for his roles in Men with Guns, Cronos, The Devil's Backbone,Scott, A. O. (November 21, 2001). The New York Times. The Devil's Backbone (review overview).
